verses.name: Genesis 38:26
verses.text: And Judah acknowledged them, and said, She hath been more righteous than I; because that I gave her not to Shelah my son. And he knew her again no more.

verses.name: Genesis 38:27
verses.text: And it came to pass in the time of her travail, that, behold, twins were in her womb.

verses.name: Genesis 38:28
verses.text: And it came to pass, when she travailed, that the one put out his hand: and the midwife took and bound upon his hand a scarlet thread, saying, This came out first.
